glsa.title: gxine: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A format string vulnerability in gxine could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: gxine is a GTK+ and xine-lib based media player.

description.p: Exworm discovered that gxine insecurely implements formatted printing in the hostname decoding function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a carefully crafted file with gxine, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All gxine users should upgrade to the latest available version:
